text: Carpometacarpal ligaments may refer to: * Dorsal carpometacarpal ligaments, the strongest and most distinct carpometacarpal ligaments, connect the carpal and metacarpal bones on their dorsal side * Palmar carpometacarpal ligaments, a series of bands on the palmar surface of the carpometacarpal joints that connect the carpal bones * Posterior carpometacarpal ligament, consists of a series of bands on the posterior surface of the carpometacarpal joints
title: Carpometacarpal ligaments
